thread.title: Maddy Hall
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Maddy Hall

author: Maddy Hall
title: Maddy Hall
text: This was our first visit to Peaches. They have an excellent selection of dresses, very knowledgeable staff, and a very organized system to assist in picking out my prom dress. It was a lot of fun and I picked out a beautiful dress for my senior prom. They have a full range of prices so everybody can't find a great dress. I would recommend Peaches for your prom dress!
